body:
my friend is trying to regrister his account but it's just stuck on 'waiting' we've refreshed and everything and it is stuck.

Any ideas?
body_tagged:
my friend is trying to regrister his account but it's just stuck on 'waiting' we've refreshed and everything and it is stuck.

Any ideas?
title: Server registration down?

replies.body: Yes it's down, something is wrong.
replies.body_tagged: Yes it's down, something is wrong.

replies.body: Can confirm that it does not work, I tried with my alt account. I'm about to put this on GitHub.
replies.body_tagged: Can confirm that it does not work, I tried with my alt account. I'm about to put this on GitHub.

reply_to.body: Can confirm that it does not work, I tried with my alt account. I'm about to put this on GitHub.
reply_to.body_tagged: Can confirm that it does not work, I tried with my alt account. I'm about to put this on GitHub.

replies.body: Yeah, in the registration process, the server which you are supposed to connect to does not work. The developers are already aware of this problem and it'll hopefully be fixed soon.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, in the registration process, the server which you are supposed to connect to does not work. The developers are already aware of this problem and it'll hopefully be fixed soon.
